WRITING.TITLE: Apple doing it again
WRITING.TEXT:

WRITING.TITLE: Feminist Paradise
WRITING.TEXT: So, I'm just wondering .. what would you feminists consider a perfectly fine social world? When is your "movement" done? What is the ideal situation to live in? I'm just curious about your mission and whether you have a goal.
